titleInfo.title: Coll 30/143 'Trucial Coast: Appointment of a Medical Officer by the California Arabian Standard Oil Company.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the appointment of Dr Louis Paul Dame, formerly of the Arabian Mission in Bahrain, as Medical Officer of the California Arabian Standard Oil Company (CASOC) in Saudi Arabia. The papers include confirmation of the appointment by the Arabian Mission, via the Political Agent, Bahrain, and an intelligence report stating that Dame had been refused permission to enter Saudi Arabia by Bin Saud [Abd al-‘Azīz bin ‘Abd al-Raḥmān bin Fayṣal Āl Sa‘ūd].
